data.description: "JUST REDUCED" RESORT LIVING ALL YEAR LONG! From The Moment You Step Into This Beautiful Open Concept Ranch Home With 5 Bedrooms & 3 Baths, You'll Feel At Home. There's A Large Open Family Room With Vaulted Ceiling, Fireplace With Gas Logs & Hardwood Floors. A Large Deck Off The Family Room Too. Kitchen Has Granite Counters, Newer Stainless Steel Appliances, Pantry & Tile Floor. Spacious Master Bedroom Features Trey Ceiling. Expansive Master Bath Has Separate Shower, Relaxing Jacuzzi Tub, Separate Sinks, Vanity & Tile Floor. There Is A Sunroom Off The Master Bedroom That Overlooks The Golf Course & Is Where The Previous Owner Had Their Office. Split Bedroom Plan. Main Floor Features 2 Additional Bedrooms & Full Bath. Finished Lower Level Could Be A Perfect In-Law Or Teen Suite! Lower Level Also Features A Large Full Kitchen & Room For Dining Area, 2 Bedrooms, Full Bath & Large Family Room. There Are Laundry Hookups On Each Floor Too. There Is A Covered Patio Area For Outdoor Fun & Gatherings As Well As A Separate Deck Set Up for You To Put Your Hot Tub. Golf Course Lot On The 11th Hole. Fairfield Plantation Is A Gated Community Featuring Golf Course, Clubhouse, Marina, 3 Lakes, Pools, Beach, Tennis Courts, Walking Trails & Playground As Well As 2 Gated Entrances With 24-Hour Guards.
